document.heading: Downtown Retail Tax Increment Financing Amendment Act of 2008

history.narrative: Law 17-262, the “Downtown Retail Tax Increment Financing Amendment Act of 2008”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 17-771 which was referred to the Committee on Finance and Revenue. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on July 15, 2008, and September 16, 2008, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on September 29, 2008, it was assigned Act No. 17-513 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 17-262 became effective on November 19, 2008.
